title: TikTok/IG Reels Video Editor (CapCut) – Daily Content for Edgy Coaching Brand
job_overview:
Salary: $5.00/hour — $360/month (flat)
Hours: Part-Time – ~18 hrs/week
Type: Long-term – Daily content, stable work
Job Description:
We're a viral transformation brand looking for a skilled Filipino video editor to create 2 short-form videos and 1 static post daily (6 days/week) using CapCut and Canva.
You’ll be provided scripts, samples, music, and voiceovers. Your role is to turn raw ideas into emotionally powerful content using CapCut or similar tools.
What You'll Do:
• Edit 2 TikTok/IG Reels per day (CapCut)
• Add captions, overlays, music, timing (you’ll be given templates)
• Design 1 static post/day (Canva or quote image)
• Deliver content daily to Google Drive
• Find 2–3 hashtags per post
Requirements:
• CapCut editing experience
• Elevenlabs experience
• Creative eye for timing, pacing, and emotion
• Canva or static design skills
• Strong English reading/listening
• Reliable and detail-oriented
• Must have access to automated posting tools (e.g., Meta Business Suite, Later, or native TikTok scheduling) to post at US time zones without delay
To Apply, Send Us:
1. 2–3 short-form videos you've edited (CapCut preferred)
2. Your current availability (hours/time zone)
3. A 1–2 sentence message on why you’re a good fit for a transformation brand
Start immediately. Bonuses and promotion available for long-term teaUpgrade to see actual infombers.
